description.value: When the Character pushes a Psyhcic Power, they can spend a Fate Point to add 1d5 to their Psy Rating when determining the effects of the psychic power they are manifesting. However they add +30 to any resulting Psycic Phenomena Rolls.

system.benefit: When the Character pushes a Psyhcic Power, they can spend a Fate Point to add 1d5 to their Psy Rating when determining the effects of the psychic power they are manifesting. However they add +30 to any resulting Psycic Phenomena Rolls.
